required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Pharmacokinetics & Food Effect of MK-0941 in Adults With Type 2 Diabetes (MK-0941-009)
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-Label, Randomized, Partially Fixed-Sequence, 4-Period Crossover Study to Assess the Pharmacokinetics After Administration of the DFC and OCT Formulations and the Food Effect on the OCT Formulation of MK-0941 in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes

brief_summary.textblock: A study to compare the pharmacokinetics (PK) of the dry filled capsule (DFC) & oral compressed tablet (OCT) formulations of MK-0941-009 & to assess the effect of food on the OCT formulation.

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Curve (AUC)(0-∞) for Oral Compressed Tablet (OCT) (Fasted) and Dry Filled Capsule (DFC) (Fasted)
primary_outcome.time_frame: From study drug administration to 72 hours post-administration

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum Concentration (Cmax) for OCT (Fasted) and DFC (Fasted)
primary_outcome.time_frame: From study drug administration to 72 hours post-administration

primary_outcome.measure: Time to Reach Cmax (Tmax) for OCT (Fasted) and DFC (Fasted)
primary_outcome.time_frame: From study drug administration to 72 hours post-administration

primary_outcome.measure: Half Life (t½) for OCT (Fasted) and DFC (Fasted)
primary_outcome.time_frame: From study drug administration to 72 hours post-administration

secondary_outcome.measure: AUC(0-∞) for OCT (Fasted) and OCT (After Meal)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From study drug administration to 72 hours post-administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Cmax of OCT (Fasted) and OCT (After Meal)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From study drug administration to 72 hours post-administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Tmax for OCT (Fasted) and OCT (After Meal)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From study drug administration to 72 hours post-administration

secondary_outcome.measure: t1/2 for OCT (Fasted) and OCT (After Meal)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From study drug administration to 72 hours post-administration

intervention.description: single dose of 10 mg MK-0941 dry filled capsules (DFC) administered in a fasted state
single dose of 10 mg MK-0941 oral compressed tablet (OCT) administered after consumption of a high-fat meal
single dose of 10 mg MK-0941 oral compressed tablet (OCT) administered before consumption of a standard breakfast
single dose of 10 mg MK-0941 oral compressed tablet (OCT) administered in a fasted state

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Males or females (of non-childbearing potential) between the ages of 18 to 70
- Participants have been diagnosed with Type 2 Diabetes
- Participants are nonsmokers for at least 6 months
Exclusion Criteria:
- Participant should not be diagnosed with Type 1 diabetes
- Participant should not be receiving insulin or PPAR gamma agonists for 12 weeks prior to study start
- Participant has a recent history of eye infection or other inflammatory eye condition within 2 weeks prior to study start
- Participant has been diagnosed with glaucoma or is blind
- Participant has had trauma to one or both eyes
- Participant has had major surgery, donated blood or participated in another clinical study in the past 4 weeks
- Participant is a regular user of illicit drugs or has a history of drug, including alcohol, abuse in the past 6 months

group.title: Treatment Group ABCD
group.description: Period 1: Dry Filled Capsule (DFC) (fasted) Period 2: Oral Compressed Tablet (OCT) (fasted) Period 3: OCT (after meal) Period 4: OCT (before meal)

group.title: Treatment Group BACD
group.description: Period 1: OCT (fasted) Period 2: DFC (fasted) Period 3: OCT (after meal) Period 4: OCT (before meal)

group.title: Treatment Group BCD
group.description: Period 1: Not Applicable Period 2: OCT (fasted) Period 3: OCT (after meal) Period 4: OCT (before meal)

participants_list.participants: 3 new participants added to Treatment Group ABCD & received treatment sequence BCD for Periods 2-4

group.title: All Randomized
group.description: Includes the 15 participants who were randomized and started the study in Treatment Period 1 (Baseline) and the 3 additional participants who were subsequently randomized and started the study in Treatment Period 2.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The SPONSOR must have the opportunity to review all proposed abstracts, manuscripts, or presentations regarding this study 60 days prior to submission for publication/presentation. Any information identified by the SPONSOR as confidential must be deleted prior to submission.
